card.text: Reach, trample Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)

card.name: Spider-Sense
card.text: Web-slinging {U} (You may cast this spell for {U} if you also return a tapped creature you control to its owner's hand.) Counter target instant spell, sorcery spell, or triggered ability.

card.name: Spider-Slayer, Hatred Honed
card.text: Whenever Spider-Slayer deals damage to a Spider, destroy that creature. {6}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create two tapped 1/1 colorless Robot artifact creature tokens with flying.

card.name: Spider-Suit
card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and is a Spider Hero in addition to its other types. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Spider-UK
card.text: Web-slinging {2}{W} (You may cast this spell for {2}{W} if you also return a tapped creature you control to its owner's hand.) At the beginning of your end step, if two or more creatures entered the battlefield under your control this turn, you draw a card and gain 2 life.

card.name: Spider-Verse
card.text: The "legend rule" doesn't apply to Spiders you control. Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, you may copy it. If you do, you may choose new targets for the copy. If the copy is a permanent spell, it gains haste. Do this only once each turn.

card.name: Spider-Woman, Stunning Savior
card.text: Flying Venom Blast — Artifacts and creatures your opponents control enter tapped.

card.name: Spiders-Man, Heroic Horde
card.text: Web-slinging {4}{G}{G} (You may cast this spell for {4}{G}{G} if you also return a tapped creature you control to its owner's hand.) When Spiders-Man enters, if they were cast using web-slinging, you gain 3 life and create two 2/1 green Spider creature tokens with reach.

card.name: Spinneret and Spiderling
card.text: Whenever you attack with two or more Spiders, put a +1/+1 counter on Spinneret and Spiderling. Whenever Spinneret and Spiderling deals 4 or more damage, exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.

card.name: Starling, Aerial Ally
card.text: Flying When Starling enters, another target creature you control gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Steel Wrecking Ball
card.text: When this artifact enters, it deals 5 damage to target creature. {1}{R}, Discard this card: Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Stegron the Dinosaur Man
card.text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Dinosaur Formula — {1}{R}, Discard this card: Until end of turn, target creature you control gets +3/+1 and becomes a Dinosaur in addition to its other types.

card.name: Strength of Will
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature you control gains indestructible and "Whenever this creature is dealt damage, put that many +1/+1 counters on it."

card.name: Suburban Sanctuary
card.text: This land enters tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W}. {4}, {T}: Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Subway Train
card.text: When this Vehicle enters, you may pay {G}. If you do, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Sudden Strike
card.text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Sun-Spider, Nimble Webber
card.text: During your turn, Sun-Spider has flying. When Sun-Spider enters, search your library for an Aura or Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Superior Foes of Spider-Man
card.text: Trample Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 4 or greater, you may exile the top card of your library. If you do, you may play that card until you exile another card with this creature.

card.name: Superior Spider-Man
card.text: Mind Swap — You may have Superior Spider- Man enter as a copy of any creature card in a graveyard, except his name is Superior Spider-Man and he's a 4/4 Spider Human Hero in addition to his other types. When you do, exile that card.

card.name: Supportive Parents
card.text: Tap two untapped creatures you control: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Swarm, Being of Bees
card.text: Flash Flying Mayhem {B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for {B} if you discarded it this turn. Timing rules still apply.)

card.name: Symbiote Spider-Man
card.text: Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, look at that many cards from the top of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Find New Host — {2}{U/B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains this card's other abilities. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Taxi Driver
card.text: {1}, {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Terrific Team-Up
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control a permanent with mana value 4 or greater. One or two target creatures you control each get +1/+0 until end of turn. They each deal damage equal to their power to target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: The Clone Saga
card.text: (As this Saga enters step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Surveil 3. II — When you next cast a creature spell this turn, copy it, except the copy isn't legendary. III — Choose a card name. Whenever a creature with the chosen name deals combat damage to a player this turn, draw a card.

card.name: The Death of Gwen Stacy
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Destroy target creature. II — Each player may discard a card. Each player who doesn't loses 3 life. III — Exile any number of target players' graveyards.

card.name: The Soul Stone
card.text: Indestructible {T}: Add {B}. {6}{B}, {T}, Exile a creature you control: Harness The Soul Stone. (Once harnessed, its ∞ ability is active.) ∞ — At the beginning of your upkeep, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: The Spot's Portal
card.text: Put target creature on the bottom of its owner's library. You lose 2 life unless you control a Villain.

card.name: The Spot, Living Portal
card.text: When The Spot enters, exile up to one target nonland permanent and up to one target nonland permanent card from a graveyard. When The Spot dies, put him on the bottom of his owner's library. If you do, return the exiled cards to their owners' hands.

card.name: Thwip!
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn. If it's a Spider, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Tombstone, Career Criminal
card.text: When Tombstone enters, return target Villain card from your graveyard to your hand. Villain spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Ultimate Green Goblin
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, discard a card, then create a Treasure token. Mayhem {2}{B/R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for {2}{B/R} if you discarded it this turn. Timing rules still apply.)

card.name: University Campus
card.text: This land enters tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}. {4}, {T}: Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Unstable Experiment
card.text: Target player draws a card, then up to one target creature you control connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.)

card.name: Urban Retreat
card.text: This land enters tapped. {T}: Add {G}, {W} , or {U}. {2}, Return a tapped creature you control to its owner's hand: Put this card from your hand onto the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Venom's Hunger
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control a Villain. Destroy target creature. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Venom, Evil Unleashed
card.text: Deathtouch {2}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. It gains deathtouch until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Venomized Cat
card.text: Deathtouch When this creature enters, mill two cards. (Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)

card.name: Vibrant Cityscape
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Villainous Wrath
card.text: Target opponent loses life equal to the number of creatures they control. Then destroy all creatures.

card.name: Vulture, Scheming Scavenger
card.text: Flying Whenever Vulture attacks, other Villains you control gain flying until end of turn.

card.name: Wall Crawl
card.text: When this enchantment enters, create a 2/1 green Spider creature token with reach, then you gain 1 life for each Spider you control. Spiders you control get +1/+1 and can't be blocked by creatures with defender.

card.name: Web Up
card.text: When this enchantment enters, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until this enchantment leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Web of Life and Destiny
card.text: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) At the beginning of combat on your turn, look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Web-Shooters
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has reach and "Whenever this creature attacks, tap target creature an opponent controls." Equip {2} ({2}:Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Web-Warriors
card.text: When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

card.name: Whoosh!
card.text: Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.) Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.

card.name: Wild Pack Squad
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, up to one target creature gains first strike and vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Wisecrack
card.text: Target creature deals damage equal to its power to itself. If that creature is attacking, Wisecrack deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: With Great Power...
card.text: Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 for each Aura and Equipment attached to it. All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to enchanted creature instead.
